event_id._comment: This is a number that represents which event a bottle file belongs to.
event_id.label: Event_Number

station._comment: The name of a station the bottle data was collected at.
station.label: Station_Name

sounding._comment: This is a numerical field that represents the depth of the sea floor for a station.
sounding.label: Sounding

latitude._comment: Can be in decimal degrees or decimal minutes. If in minutes, it should take the format 'N HH MM.SSSS'.
latitude.label: Latitude

longitude._comment: Can be in decimal degrees or decimal minutes. If in minutes, it should take the format 'W HH MM.SSSS'.
longitude.label: Longitude

instrument_name._comment: A serial number or common name for a CTD. If not provided in the file, the default name will just be 'CTD'.
instrument_name.label: Instrument_serial_number

comments._comment: Additional comments or notes about the event.
comments.label: Event_Comments
